headline: MGM Resorts introduces W hotel in Las Vegas to its portfolio
summary: This addition signifies expansion of the licensing agreement between MGM Resorts and Marriott International.

headline: Hotel Equities Chosen to Operate 29 Postcard Cabins Locations Nationwide
summary: ATLANTA - Hotel Equities is proud to announce its been selected to operate Postcard Cabins, a leader in the outdoor hospitality sector and a newly acquired brand under Marriott International. Hotel...

headline: Hyatt bets on Las Vegas with Venetian loyalty tie-up
summary: The pair entered a long-term licensing deal that will bring the luxury Strip resort under Hyatt’s booking channels, following a similar Vegas deal between Marriott and MGM Resorts.

raw.headline: Hyatt bets on Las Vegas with Venetian loyalty tie-up
raw.summary: The pair entered a long-term licensing deal that will bring the luxury Strip resort under Hyatt’s booking channels, following a similar Vegas deal between Marriott and MGM Resorts.
